sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO bal_signautopay_his (ID_NO, PHONE_NO, BUSI_TYPE, PAY_MONEY, BALANCE_LIMIT, AUTO_FLAG, PAY_DAY, LOGIN_NO, OP_TIME, LAST_PAY_TIME, FLAG, UPDATE_ACCEPT, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_LOGIN, UPDATE_FLAG) SELECT ID_NO, PHONE_NO, BUSI_TYPE, PAY_MONEY, BALANCE_LIMIT, AUTO_FLAG, PAY_DAY, LOGIN_NO, OP_TIME, LAST_PAY_TIME, FLAG, #UPDATE_ACCEPT#, sysdate, #UPDATE_LOGIN#, #UPDATE_FLAG# FROM bal_signautopay_info WHERE id_no = #ID_NO#
